column4: When I use find it says that there is a directory called /trash, but when i do cd /trash it says that there isn't this directory so how to access it?

Hi guys! I am trying to access a file called /trash. When I use find it says that there is a directory called /trash, but when i do cd /trash it says that there isn't this directory so how to access it?
, kalosaurusrex, the command find just says /trash
